CustomField.description: This field will be hidden from page layout and used on Email Template under signatory to notify end client
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(Interaction_Owner__r.Id ='0051N0000078NiC',Interaction_Owner__r.Id = '005o0000001eWfG'),'Paul Pirri'+BR()+'Acting Manager, Entrepreneurship Services'+BR()+'City of Toronto', Interaction_Owner__r.FirstName+' '+Interaction_Owner__r.LastName )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will be hidden from page layout and used on Email Template under signatory to notify end client
CustomField.label: Email Signatory Name
